entry.title: Dense Fog Advisory issued September 09 at 8:31AM AKDT until September 09 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT TODAY NEAR GLENNALLEN... * WHAT...Visibility to a quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Glennallen and low lying areas along the Copper River. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.

entry.summary: ...OZONE HIGH POLLUTION ADVISORY FOR MARICOPA COUNTY INCLUDING THE PHOENIX METRO AREA SATURDAY...
